name: Cooolio Online
description: One Stop Shop For All Your Tech Needs
overview:
Cooolio is a full service agency providing consulting expertise in the areas of business strategy, user interface development and technology/application development

Mission: To be a technology leader delivering revolutionary products and world class services enhancing the online experience by creating value for both businesses and customers

Business Units

CooolTech: CooolTech Development creates and innovates through its products and service offerings. We recommend and implement open source technologies to bring in cost effective solutions.CooolTech is involved in the creation and development of web and mobile applications, ERPs and eCommerce websites.

CooolServe: Cooolio’s ad operations work across the spectrum covering pre, during and post sale operations in online advertising. CooolServe specializes in Sales Planning, Ad Trafficking, Inventory Management, Campaign Management, Site Testing, Report Generation (Campaign / Ad hoc), Marketing Research and Analytics

CooolNet: Cooolio’s in-house advertising network that seeks to tap the possibilities available in this emerging sector of the online market and provide a middle ground for Publishers and Advertisers to connect.
